website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the price and prefer a large set, this is a good choice. Though not quite as versatile as some competitors, the craftsmanship is a close contender to the best.
pros: An 8-piece set with 4 internal and 4 external pliers with precision tips that are built to hold up to tough jobs
Tools have a durable feel in the hand
cons: Tips are too large for some tasks and tight spaces
One of the most costly on our list, yet doesn't come with a case

customer_reviews.title: Each one is the same
customer_reviews.text: I work on a small electric motor, Electrical power equipment, large meat slicer, Drill press. Snap rings are typically small, It doesn't matter which KNIPEX tool I pick, the minimum distance and size of the tip are the same, between all 8 hand tools in the set. I left an email with the KNIPEX asking which KNIPEX tools(s) I should purchase if I want a small tip? it's been over two years I never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Who me?

customer_reviews.title: No spring on internal ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed that the internal snap ring pliers don’t have a spring to close the jaws. They advertise an internal spring but do not specify the internal ring pliers are not equipped with a spring.
customer_reviews.author: Whole Mama

customer_reviews.title: I've tried lots of snap ring pliers and these are the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I farm and we do most of our mechanic work which involves quite a few snap rings. My dad has a name brand set he bought in college 45 years ago that works pretty good. Otherwise we have bought lots of sets every thing from cheap ones to name brand stuff even the same brand as Dads old set. Most break after a few uses and they all frustrate us. I've had these for a few months now and every time I use them I can't believe how they just bite into the snap ring and never slip. I will be buying a second set for our service truck.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Is Expensive - Buy 1 Set 1 Time and be HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: When I think back to how many years I struggled with horrible, cheap Chinese cr*p and all the aggravation and headache caused by a shoddy tool it depresses me. I don't often need snap ring pliers but when I do, the last thing I will ever struggle with again is shoddy tools that make the job hard / impossible! Just used them the other day and was sooooo happy and grateful. I think I changed out extra snap rings just for the fun of it.....lifetime investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Solid Set
customer_reviews.text: Solid set, and less then what a snap on set would have cost. I use these rebuilding hydraulic pumps and so they go through a lot. Always have a solid feel and keep a good grip when removing or installing snap rings. I like the dedicated tool for internal and external, the slip apart universal ones seem to be wobbly and prone to shooting the snap ring across the room at the worse possible time.
customer_reviews.author: M. higbee

customer_reviews.title: Best tools ever
customer_reviews.text: What to tell you-Knipex. Once you try them, you will never go to other one. Bought all snap ring tools from autozone and Orailey and broke all of them , couldn't even remove the snap ring out of my axle. with this one-piece of cake. 2 seconds and it was out!
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: These are good pliers for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Mmmm....actually good tools for once!!!! thank you knipex. They are a somewhat narrow profile compared to others with reversible handles, i was able to get into a tight spot on a f350 hub where others broke. Normally a PITA job but these worked great, feel appreciative for a tool that gets the job done. They seem very well priced for what you are getting. Shipped super quick from this seller, im happy job is done!
customer_reviews.author: Scalch

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have in your box.
customer_reviews.text: After researching snap ring pliers I decided to purchase this set. Used a set from harbor freight for many years but most of the tips broke off or bent on them. Also have a set of Blue Points' with the interchangeable tips that occasionally work. I like that the tips on these are angled so the snap ring doesn't come off. Edit: I broke one of the smaller size plier, my Matco guy was able to warranty it for me which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It's Knipex.  Need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. No, they are not cheap, but they are amazing. Treat yourself in life and ditch the HF or OEM brand crap from the auto parts stores. Life is too short for Chinese made tools.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality to last a lifetime.  Buy once, cry once.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but the quality surpasses everything else I looked at. Channellock with the replaceable tips is ok on the bench, but useless in the field. Harbor Freight or yex.com had terrible quality control and highly suspect durability. For items where quality metallurgy is required, you really have to go USA or German made. Buy once, cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Somewhere in SD

customer_reviews.title: These are well made tools.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made tools. They are forged and machined. Not stamped steel like others. I’m very impressed. The set I used before is junk compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Armour

customer_reviews.title: the best snap ring pliers you can get!
customer_reviews.text: I believe I bought them somewhere else. None the less, these are quality equal to snap on ones. I usually use them to rebuilt air relay valves or for replacing slack adjusters. I did use snap on ones couple times and knipex ones are as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Knipex are the best snap ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our coupler modification with many small to large snap rings. They are pricey, but dependable. Not like that junk from China.
customer_reviews.author: TrainTec

customer_reviews.title: End the frustration...
customer_reviews.text: Never struggle again with snap rings. These pliers are perfect, they fit the snap rings properly and the ends are a bit longer than others which help guide the ring on the tool. The tools are built very robust and with simple care should last a long time. Yes, a bit more than other sets but the quality is top-notch. End the frustrating struggle with changing tips, cheap pliers. Buy them one time and cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brigande

customer_reviews.title: The standard by which others are measured
customer_reviews.text: Like them much better than my snap on snap ring pliers; must have for serious work....
customer_reviews.author: Weyman Cannington

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't Come with case or pouch for storage had to buy one from Milwaukee. What I give a 5 star if came what carrying case or carrying pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Marina

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: Needed these as we took apart a Mustang transmission. They work very well and are durable. They were perfect for my needs. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!
customer_reviews.text: Best snap-ring pliers I've used! Way better than the junk you get at the corner autoparts store!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis P.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible tools!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I've seen. If you deal with circlips quite a bit, these are a must have. Clips that used to take an hour to remove, take about 30 seconds with one of these. There are a bunch of them, but so what? Those interchangeable tip tools are a waste of money. I'll never use one of those again. It's making me look at the other pliers made by Knipex.
customer_reviews.author: Bob In Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This probably the best snap ring pliers I've ever used and I've been wrenching for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built product!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of snap ring pliers! The quality is great, all of them have springs in them. There kind of expensive but I believe they’ll last a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: The best quality in a hand tool that I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: These are the top of the line snap ring pliers without a doubt. I will likely never have to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Precision
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and cost twice as much as Snap-On set. The Snap-on set is featured differently and it's not a precision tool. These are fixed individual tool. There are only a few companies that actually make fixed circlip tool and this brand is probably the only high quality brand in the market at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: L Tran

customer_reviews.title: These are it ! Look no further .
customer_reviews.text: Don’t screw around with anything else and just get these things . These will save you so much frustration you’ll wan’t to put them under your pillow just to be close to them .
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality tool, which is why I bought it and I'm VERY happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: ComfortCats

customer_reviews.title: best pliers company
customer_reviews.text: they are knipex well worth the money for a professional
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: By far the BEST snap ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: They are stronger and more precisely fit than any snap ring pliers we've even had in our shop! And, we've been through a bunch of lesser quality ones. These will last!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Buy these !!!
customer_reviews.text: After using these ONCE... I took a hammer to the other three I own !!! Not joking.
customer_reviews.author: Starchild

customer_reviews.title: No regrets about buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Buy these and throw away your old snap ring set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pliers in one case
customer_reviews.text: Kit covers MOST snap ring sizes but not very small ones. These are for maybe 1/2" shaft size and up. Typical Knipex German quality- well made, accurate and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stuts

customer_reviews.title: perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional mechanic and need the best, especially when it comes to snap ring pliers. Knipex makes an excellent product. Their tools will last a career if taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: High-end and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different snap ring pliers and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: sean kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality tossed all my others
customer_reviews.text: These deserve a better rating fine quality tools i literally tossed all my others.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Germans got it right with Knipex
customer_reviews.text: The quality is obvious when you open these up and fondle them.Better than any ones Ive ever used.I was surprised these are spring loaded ( open ).The spring is enclosed internally.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best circlip pliers on the market by far. love them
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best snap ring pliers you will find
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best snap ring pliers you will find. If you are tired of the frustration caused by disposable snap ring pliers that you find at any big box store then these are the tools for you.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronm

customer_reviews.title: Very good tools.
customer_reviews.text: I use these things hard almost every day. They seem to be holding up very well. Good tools.
customer_reviews.author: DuchessAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: it was a great price for a very good set of snap ring Plires
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Geeeeeees

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Grandson, Per his request. He is a Cummins diesel mechanic. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Finally pliers designed to remove snap rings
customer_reviews.text: Best snap ring pliers. Throw away the other ones. Will not go back to anything else. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Gagliano

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Quite simply... they work ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Quite simply ... they work. I have been through so many of these tools that slip and twist or break. These are well made and work as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great snap ring pliers
customer_reviews.text: best snap ring pliers I have ever used comparable to snap on
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the price and quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the price and quality of the product. These pliers have made removal and installation of snap rings very easy. I would definately purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools
customer_reviews.text: No more cheapos for me. These are awesome, and worth every penny of their high price.
customer_reviews.author: Old Duffer in the Outback of Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: What can I say??? ...it is hard to beat Knipex quality. I would definitely recommend this set to those looking to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: John in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: The best pliers in the tool industry.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best in the business. Great quality very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jchop

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best price and I love having the variety.
customer_reviews.author: rodney byers jr

customer_reviews.title: Just what he needed
customer_reviews.text: The handles are smaller than he was expecting, but they worked well and are now residing on the peg board.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Used for snap rings on S Cams worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools expensive but I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I have ever used in over 40 years in in the industrial world of part making and assembly.
customer_reviews.author: vavoline6

customer_reviews.title: but useless for precision work like hydraulic lifters and small oil ...
customer_reviews.text: The very first snap ring I needed to remove, I couldn't use this set because the tips were all too large. I guess these will work for larger snap rings, but useless for precision work like hydraulic lifters and small oil pump gears.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, quality set. Would be great if they had a better storage case.
customer_reviews.author: lectricman

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best style of snap ring pliers I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best style of snap ring pliers I have ever used. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ziolkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Built with the same quality as the other knipex products.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what the son wanted for Christmas. can't beat the price. $100 cheaper than the tool man.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: finally some excellent quality snap ring pliers. tired of the cheap imports of stamped steel that are so loose and sloppy you can't get a good grip. tired of the interchangeable tip channel lock brand i bought these. had the pleasure of testing a few of them out this evening. very nice tight fitting pliers , tips that fit nicely into the snap rings and don't move around. yes they cost a lot, but when you really need them they'll work really well .
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Build to last spring loaded. Strong metal. .not the twain ..Thanks diesel mechanic
customer_reviews.author: Peter HIll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: will never have to buy snap ring pliers again i guess
customer_reviews.author: JON

customer_reviews.title: great product and wished I had bought this several years
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, great product and wished I had bought this several years ago
customer_reviews.author: Michael Childress

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Solid snap ring pliers. Hopefully the only set I ever have to buy. The work I do, requires using these often, my coworkers are jealous
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Used on of them this weekend and it was nice to have some that could handle the big stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: I like having each pair of pliers for inside or outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I like having each pair of pliers for inside or outside snaprings. the 90' inside large pair of these comes in particularly handy when removing intermediate or front servo cover of Ford's 5R55(W, S, whatever) these do a better job than my Matco or Snapon pliers. There are only two sizes of pliers here though. they'll grab most rings with the two sizes included.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey R Layne

customer_reviews.title: quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Pros;better than comparable price pliers. Made with precision. Smooth spring return. Cons; It would be good if all pliers were all spring return
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Should come with a better case
customer_reviews.text: The Tools are very nice, - But I took a star away because I would liek to see a better case that these come in, The one it comes in is only a cheap plastic holder, I would like to see nice hard plastic or something.
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They don't have a good feel to them. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wauhkonen

customer_reviews.title: Missing plier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tools. but there was a missing plier in my set ( 48 11 j1)

customer_reviews.title: I don't expect like this the picture it's look standard but
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect like this the picture it's look standard but not

product_meta.title: KNIPEX Tools 00 20 04 SB, Precision Circlip Snap-Ring Pliers 8-Piece Set
product_meta.description: Contains common precision circlip pliers for highest requirements. Attractive sales packaging with euro standard perforation. Sturdy plastic packaging, also suitable for storage of the pliers.
feature_bullets: Eight of Knipex best selling Precision circlip pliers in one kit - includes foam tool storage tray
Heavy duty for continuous operation - up to 10 times longer service life than turned tips
Tips are made of high-density spring steel and offer a high level of protection against excessive stress and strain
Contains Internal Circlip Pliers: 48 11 J1, 48 11 J2, 48 21 J11, and 48 21 J21
Contains External Circlip Pliers: 49 11 A1, 49 11 A2, 49 21 A11, and 49 21 A21
